segments.text: The kitchen looks so ordinary with that open window and garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink is gross; water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's drying dishes like nothing's wrong, foot in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids raiding the cookie jar make me sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that unstable stool, what a foolish risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could slip on the wet floor after he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, hand out, greedy little thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies will get stale from all this humidity anyway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing such avoidable messes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful outside makes the inside look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
